Description: Limestone ostracon with remains of 9 lines of text on the recto containing a list of Jesus' disciples and their former profession.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Egypt Exploration Fund (probably from the Excavation 1910-11)
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (303-306, pl.43)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82908) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82908)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 42 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
